question_text:
Question 23 
 
In which of the following pairs of cycles, both cycles have at least one isothermal process?
Application of Thermodynamics (Thermodynamic cycles) 
 
(A) Bell-Coleman cycle and Vapour compression refrigeration cycle 
 
(B) Carnot cycle and Stirling cycle 
 
(C) Brayton cycle and Rankine cycle 
 
(D) Diesel cycle and Otto cycle 
Ans. 
B 
Sol.
 
Both carnot cycle and stirling cycle include atleast one isothermal process.
